text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Superstar Cesario!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Waaaahh!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Finally――

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text: ――Fufuu.

Without a doubt, this was an inflection point in the 
history of this country, no, of the Uma Musume world.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
She did it! She did it! 
Our Cesario-san did……!
Yeah, she did it!
Yeah, she did it!

The girls here were overjoyed. 
And, most likely, back in our home country too――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
She did iiiiiit!!! Cesario did……! 
Everyone, Cesario really did it……!

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it was amazing～. 
I've got goosebumps～!

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
So good! 
I really wanted to see it up close!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I did it…… 
Finally, I……made it, didn't I? With these legs)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Following in the footsteps of our senpais…… 
and a record that won't lose to Kraft's――in this place)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(With this, I can be proud. 
I've done what I needed to. And――)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: (And for the girls that come after me, it can become a symbol)

text_block_list.name: 3rd Place Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
<If I go to that country, will I be able 
to run like that? Then, someday I'll……>

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Fufuu

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
To everyone in America. And to everyone around the 
world watching, thank you very much. ――I am Cesario.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Being able to obtain a G1 victory in America, is a first for 
my country. Everyone has something they want to accomplish……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And I feel that I've finally accomplished what I wanted to. 
For the many girls that are ready to spread their wings…… 
I finally feel like I have something to leave for them.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much. 
Thank you for everything.
(Ooooooooohー……)

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
<What a wonderful Uma Musume. 
Not only is she fast, she's also polite>

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: <Yes, she has a heart as broad as the sea>

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Fufu, seems like they're praising her quite a bit.
On top of that――

text_block_list.name: Interview Translator
text_block_list.text:
Just 2 races before, an amazing Uma Musume 
like you was unable to win. Why was that?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, the Uma Musume that won that time, Rhein Kraft…… 
is faster than me. Especially when it comes to Miles.
(Oooooooooooooh)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeh, why does it seem like she's introducing me～!????

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: <Rhein Kraft. An Uma Musume said to be faster than Cesario……>

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: <Rhein Kraft……just how fast are you?>

Because of Cesario's remarks, it seems like the 『Oka Sho』 
winner, Rhein Kraft was going to get more attention.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe…… But really, congratulations, Cesario. 
You're amazing……it's almost like you're a legend already……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Huh……? But, it seems like……

After her victory, Cesario had a contented smile on her face. 
That one scene would become part of history――

And be burned in to our memory. 
A story that we would remember, and pass on forever.

And be burned in to our memory. 
A story that we would remember, and pass on forever.
